game.noActivities: Once you have scheduled an offered activity, the corresponding activity appointments are displayed here.
game.noOffers: The activity recommendations and invitations from the campaign manager, from the YOUPERS Coach and from your co-workers are displayed here.
game.noClosedEvents: Once you have reported a scheduled activity as executed or missed, the corresponding appointment is displayed as closed activity.
game.noDismissedOffers: If you dismiss an offer, it is displayed here.
